name: Bom Garoto
description:
'Bom Garoto' is a casual game where you control a dog who needs to repair the damage caused by a cat. This game was made for global game jam with the theme 'repair'.

Made by:

Francisco Orestes @Cyro907- Screenplay

João Carlos @Jcarlosb - Art

João Guilherme  - Tumati - Programming

João Pedro - jpverdan - Programming

Lucas Vieira @Ludyn- Game Design
